name: Baby Gift 'Cupcakes'
description:
This “sweet” gift is made out of fun contemporary baby grows of various patterns and colours. Presented as a cute little cupcake with a cherry on top, it adds fun and originality to giving baby clothes! No wonder these are our best sellers. Send one or send a few…we will leave that up to you. 

Ingredients: 

1 patterned baby grow (100% cotton, size 3-6 months)
1 Re- Usable Ovenproof Silcone Cupcake/Muffin Case 
Plus a faux cherry on top!

name: 'The Ultimate Celebration' Towel Cake
description:
This gift is suitable for so many special occasions. You could present this to a friend on a significant birthday, a couple on their marriage or anniversary or use it to create a stunning wedding gift or table decoration at an engagement, bridal shower or house warming party.
This contemporary cake is beautifully handcrafted out of towels and facecloths, topped with flowers and summer fruits, into a stunning present which makes a perfect, practical gift!


Ingredients:
8 x Face Cloths (4x White, 4x Cream, 100% cotton)
2 White Hand Towels (100% cotton)
2 White Bath Towels (100% cotton)
Plastic fruit and silk flowers for the trimmings
Satin and Organza ribbon, with organza bow
A faux cherry on top!

name: Signature Cherry 'N' Cream 'Baby Cake'
description:
This 5 tiered ‘cake’ is our signature design; a favorite by many! Created from key essential baby ‘ingredients’ including nappies and baby clothing, this gift is sure to get people talking, whether at a Baby Shower or Christening. New mums love them!


Ingredients:

55 Huggies Superdry Disposable Nappies 
2 White Baby grows (100% cotton, size 3-6 months)
2 White Bibs (100% cotton, one size)
2 Pairs of White Socks (Size 0-0)
1 White Hat (100% cotton, one size)
Contemporary Ribbon to decorate
Faux Cherries on top!

Alternatively, name the price and a cake will be made up to suit..... either adding more clothing and a larger cake or fewer items and a smaller cake!

All clothing in this product are sized at 3-6 months, giving the recipient plenty of time to enjoy the gift before unwrapping. Your gift will be beautifully wrapped in cellophane with a bow and gift tag with your personal message and will be securely packaged for delivery.

name: Tray of Baby Cupcakes
description:
This fun and irresistible gift contains a set of 6 baby grows, all wrapped up to look like a complete tray of cupcakes! Each contains a coordinating set of designs for the new baby, all presented in a reusable cupcake tray. Each tray is slightly different so the colours and patterns will vary from one to the next., making the gift truly unique! Let us know if it is for a girl, boy or neutral and we will select appropriate colours.

Ingredients:

6 colourful and contemporary baby grows (3-6 months)
Reusable silicon bakeware cupcake tray
With a cherry on top of each cupcake!

name: Strawberry/Blueberry and Cherry 'BabyCake'
description:
Send an unforgettable surprise for a little baby girl (pink) or little boy (blue) with one of our gorgeous 4 tiered ‘Strawberry/Blueberry and Cherry ‘BabyCakes’. This includes nappies and baby clothing for the new arrival, all packed with fun and fabulous style. These cakes are great for Baby Showers, Christenings or simply welcoming the little one! What a change it makes to flowers, which only last a few days!


Ingredients: 

35 Huggies Superdry Disposable Nappies 
1 White Baby grow (100% cotton, size 3-6 months) 
1 White Pairs of Socks (size 0-0)
1 White Hat (100% cotton, one size)
1 White Bib (100% cotton, one size)
Beautiful organza and ribbon to decorate
Faux cherries on top!
